FrageText.de: Was bedeutet gelbes Blinklicht der Ampel?
FrageText.en: What does the yellow flashing of the traffic light indicate?
FrageText.hr: Što znači žuto treptavo svjetlo semafora?
FrageText.sl: Kaj pomeni rumena utripajoča luč na semaforju?
FrageText.tr: Trafik lambasında sarı yanıp sönen ışığın anlamı nedir?

de.Text: Die Ampel schaltet auf grün um

en.Text: The traffic light is going to turn green

sl.Text: Na semaforju bo zagorela zelena luč
